title: Run Mindful Retreats
desc: 1. ?? ? 2. ? 3. ? 4. ? 5. ?? ? ? The minimum age is 18 if attending alone.? We encourage families to share nature, running, trails? and time with each other.? If you would like to attend with a child 13 years or older who has a running background we would love to have you share the experience together.? You should fill out a registration form for each person attending. Email us at  Also check out our   for more information. 4.?  The retreat is directed towards runners and hikers of all ability levels. We will be running/hiking with opportunities for up to 3-5 hours each day. You will be able to shorten the routes to a level you are comfortable with each day. The routes will be 95% trail, in the mountains. Yes. We will have three group leaders and welcome hikers as well as all levels of runners.
